attributes.action: Amend GCSE exam content for children that are now in year 9 and year 10
attributes.additional_details: The worry these children are going to have in catching up education missed that they need to achieve good GCSE grades is going to have an impact on mental health and further education, and future career aspects. The exams should be simplified with some content eradicated so they can catch up in schools as they have up to now missed 9 months of education which is imperative to their gaining good grades in their GCSES.
attributes.background: Relook at  the exam content structure and simplify it for children who will be taking their exams in 2022 and 2023 as they have lost so much time in school. These children are now in Year 9 and Year 10, and have lost education in both lockdowns, it is going to be hard for them to catch-up.
